sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kēxuéjiā zhèngzài yánzhì xīnyào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les scientifiques développent un nouveau médicament.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Scientists are developing a new medicine.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cài lǐ yào shǎo fàng yán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut mettre moins de sel dans les plats.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Put less salt in the food.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shí nián hòu, tā yīrán měilì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dix ans plus tard, elle est toujours belle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Ten years later, she is still beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiūtiān yèzi dōu diào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En automne, les feuilles sont toutes tombées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In autumn, all the leaves have fallen.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài xuéxí yīxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il étudie la médecine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is studying medicine.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì jìnkǒu shāngpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un produit importé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an imported product.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīliáo tiáojiàn yuèláiyuè hǎo le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les conditions médicales s'améliorent de plus en plus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Medical conditions are getting better and better.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yèyú shíjiān xǐhuan dǎqiú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pendant mon temps libre, j'aime jouer au ballon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In my spare time, I like to play ball.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这件事引起了广泛关注。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì yǐnqǐ le guǎngfàn guānzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette affaire a attiré une large attention.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This matter has attracted widespread attention.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我喜欢苹果以及其他水果。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan píngguǒ yǐjí qítā shuǐguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime les pommes ainsi que d'autres fruits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like apples as well as other fruits.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zài sān tiān yǐnèi wánchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez terminer dans les trois jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please complete within three days.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rúguǒ yǒu yíwèn qǐng tíchūlái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Si vous avez des questions, veuillez les poser.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If you have questions, please raise them.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǐn wǒ jìn le bàngōngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il m'a conduit dans le bureau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He led me into the office.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī yǐnjìn le xīn jìshù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a introduit une nouvelle technologie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company introduced new technology.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì gōngmín de yìwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est le devoir des citoyens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a citizen's duty.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàjiā zài yìlùn zhè jiàn shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde discute de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone is discussing this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè yǒnggǎn de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une personne courageuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a brave person.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào yǒu yǒngqì miànduì kùnnan.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois avoir le courage de faire face aux difficultés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You must have the courage to face difficulties.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngchǎng zhìzào qìchē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette usine fabrique des voitures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This factory manufactures cars.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ kàndào le tā de yǐngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai vu son ombre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I saw his shadow.
